title: Community Voice comms  |  I invite the OCE community to join.
body:
HELLO, 
I recently bought a Voice Comms that is UNLIMITED users and I invite the OCE community to join. **Lets get the community going and enjoy gaming as a whole.** I also put in channels for LF normals and LF ranked duo.

**Free locked channels and Ranks:**
-  I can offer free channels to people with a password for mates to join so its hassle free from trolls.
-  You can also choose to have your own rank which can be easy for mates to join.

**WANT TO JOIN? **   **CLICK THE LINK AND DOWNLOAD THE PROGRAM NOW.**
https://www.gamevox.com/en/download
SERVER:
Search for **Gods of Aus **
or (click to add to favourite's)
https://www.gamevox.com/THRS-359 

**Please not if the server starts to have mass numbers joining it maybe hard to obtain and channel as many people will request it.****

replies.body: Yeah buddy lets get a good LOL community going in Oceania.
